title: LoL 14gb?
body: I got new pc and i trying to install lol but i installed 3gb then its show i need more 14?

replies.body: I am having the same issue. Is there a way I can download the 14 GB without using the lol client? I can't download the full 14 gb in one hit and every time I sign back in the download meter gets back to 0%

Since this is the first time you're installing League on this new pc you're going to need to let that install fully complete. The initial 14 gb install covers everything you'll need for the game to function properly, and then patches will help to clear out any files that are no longer needed.
